#libraries 
```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(COVID19)
```

#Examining situation in USA
```{r situation-USA}
covid_us <- covid19("USA", level = 2)
ggplot(covid_us, aes(x = date , y = confirmed)) +
geom_line() +
facet_wrap(~id)
```


```{r examining-situation}
covid_us %>% dplyr::filter(id %in%
c("USA, New York",
"USA, Arizona",
"USA, Utah",
"USA, Florida")
) %>%
ggplot(aes(x = date , y = confirmed, color = id)) +
geom_line()
```
